name: Beat of the City
description:
“City-builder and rhythm game? No way it will work.” − Probably you

This game was made in 48h for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.
The theme was : Mixing Genres.

In this game you have to build a city by clicking in rhythm in order to place new buildings. Place carefully your buildings according to their surrounding while matching  the rhythm in order to get the best score.



How to play:

  • Left click (on a valid spot): Place the building on the black bar

Click in rhythm to win even more accuracy points. Clicking randomly will make you lose points. The order of buildings is random. Sorry if you get 12 stores in a row!

Credits:

  • Game Engine: Unity 2019
